app.name: Pathway
app.description: Transform your productivity with AI, gamification and social networks.

gamification.title: Opinion on Gamification
gamification.content: Gamification systems have changed how I achieve my goals. But sometimes the competition can be overwhelming.

productivity.title: Opinion on Productivity Apps
productivity.content: Apps have helped me stay organized, but I find some difficult to use.

social.title: Opinion on Social Networks
social.content: Sharing my achievements on social media motivates me, though I don't want my privacy compromised.

general.title: General Opinion
general.content: A combination of gamification, productivity and social networks is ideal, but should be balanced and easy to use.

marathon: Build endurance with weekly long runs

TestExplanation.how-tests-work-title: How Our Tests Help You Learn
TestExplanation.how-tests-work-description: Our intelligent testing system adapts to your learning journey, providing personalized feedback and tracking your progress over time.
TestExplanation.section1-title: Answer Questions At Your Own Pace
TestExplanation.section1-description1: Our tests are designed to be taken at your convenience. Each test is tailored to measure your understanding of specific objectives.
TestExplanation.section1-description2: You'll answer a series of questions related to your learning goals, helping you identify areas where you excel and where you might need additional practice.
TestExplanation.section1-benefit2: Tests aligned with your learning objectives
TestExplanation.section1-benefit3: Answer at your own pace with no time pressure
TestExplanation.section1-question1: What is the first step in the learning process?
TestExplanation.section1-question2: How often should you review material?
TestExplanation.section1-answer2: At regular intervals based on retention studies
TestExplanation.section2-description1: When you submit your test, our system goes to work analyzing your answers against learning objectives.
TestExplanation.section2-description2: We don't just count right and wrong answers - we look for patterns in your responses to provide meaningful insights about your learning progress.
TestExplanation.section2-step1-description: Your answers are evaluated against learning objectives
TestExplanation.section2-step2-description: We detect your strengths and areas for improvement
TestExplanation.section2-step3-description: Creating personalized recommendations for next steps
TestExplanation.section3-description1: After evaluation, you'll receive a clear breakdown of your results with specific feedback on each question.
TestExplanation.section3-description2: Your performance is tracked over time, allowing you to see how you're progressing toward mastery of your learning objectives.
TestExplanation.section3-insight-content: Tests help identify knowledge gaps and reinforce learning through the testing effect - the act of retrieving information strengthens memory.
TestExplanation.section3-question2: How many review sessions are optimal?
TestExplanation.cta-description: Start testing your knowledge and see how you're advancing toward your learning goals.

Pathway.test-use: We use tests to measure progress
Pathway.test-start-message: Click on "Start" to see the sample animation
Pathway.hero-subheading: The first platform that combines artificial intelligence with gamification and proven learning techniques for extraordinary results.
Pathway.first-section-subheading: We transform your ideas into concrete skills, step by step
Pathway.second-section-subheading: Test your knowledge and reinforce your learning
Pathway.third-section-subheading: Technology that adapts to your way of learning
Pathway.feedback-text: We understand that opinions on gamification, productivity apps, and social media sharing are key. We've taken their insights into account to design an experience that combines the best of everything.
Pathway.newsletter-subheading: Subscribe to receive a notification when the app is available.
Pathway.provide-valid-email: Please enter a valid email address
Pathway.subscription-failed: There was an error subscribing you. Please try again.
Pathway.terms-agreement: By subscribing, I agree to the
Pathway.agree-to-terms: Please agree to the terms and conditions to continue.

piano.symbol: What does the 'p' symbol mean in sheet music?
piano.keys: How many white keys does a standard piano have?
piano.chord: Which notes make up a C major chord?
piano.position: What's the correct finger position for a C scale?
piano.answer_position: Thumb on C, index on D, middle on E
piano.pedal: What does the right pedal do?
piano.answer_pedal: Sustains the notes (wrong: makes sound louder)

Terms.intro-paragraph: Welcome to our application. These Terms and Conditions govern your use of our newsletter service and outline the rules for subscribing to our communications.
Terms.acceptance-paragraph: By subscribing to our newsletter, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please do not subscribe to our newsletter.
Terms.newsletter-description: Our newsletter is designed to keep subscribers informed about our application and services. By subscribing, you will receive emails related to:
Terms.newsletter-purpose-commercial: Commercial offers, promotions, and discount opportunities related to our application
Terms.newsletter-purpose-beta: Invitations to participate in beta testing of new application features and functionalities
Terms.newsletter-purpose-features: Polls and surveys regarding potential new features and your preferences
Terms.newsletter-purpose-announcements: Launch announcements for new features, services, and application updates
Terms.subscription-paragraph-1: To subscribe to our newsletter, you must provide a valid email address. You are responsible for ensuring the accuracy of the information you provide.
Terms.subscription-paragraph-2: The frequency of our communications may vary based on our release schedule, promotions, and other factors. We aim to send relevant content and avoid excessive communications.
Terms.privacy-paragraph-1: When you subscribe to our newsletter, we collect your email address and any other information you voluntarily provide. This information is used to send you the newsletter and to personalize content based on your preferences.
Terms.privacy-paragraph-2: We may use tracking technologies to monitor how subscribers interact with our emails, including open rates and click-through rates. This data helps us improve our communications and services.
Terms.privacy-paragraph-3: Your personal information will be handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. We will not sell or rent your email address to third parties, although we may share anonymized, aggregated data for analytical purposes.
Terms.unsubscribe-paragraph: You may unsubscribe from our newsletter at any time by clicking the 'Unsubscribe' link included in every email we send, or by contacting us directly. Upon unsubscribing, we will promptly remove your email address from our distribution list for marketing communications, though we may retain certain information as required for legal or legitimate business purposes.
Terms.content-paragraph-1: While we strive to ensure the accuracy of the information contained in our newsletters, we do not warrant that all content will be error-free. Promotional offers may be subject to additional terms and conditions, which will be clearly communicated.
Terms.content-paragraph-2: We reserve the right to determine the content, timing, and recipients of our newsletters. Beta testing invitations and feature polls may be sent to selected segments of our subscriber base based on usage patterns, previous feedback, or other criteria.
Terms.changes-paragraph: We reserve the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. We will notify subscribers of any material changes via email. Your continued subscription to our newsletter following such notification constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.
Terms.contact-paragraph: If you have questions or concerns about these Terms and Conditions or our newsletter service, please contact our support team. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and thoroughly.

Privacy.intro-paragraph: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect information when you use our application and services. We are committed to ensuring the privacy and security of all our users.
Privacy.scope-paragraph: By using our application, subscribing to our newsletter, or interacting with our services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
Privacy.collection-paragraph: We collect minimal information necessary to provide and improve our services. This may include:
Privacy.collection-email: Email address (when subscribing to our newsletter)
Privacy.collection-usage: Anonymous usage data (such as interaction patterns and feature usage)
Privacy.ai-paragraph-1: Our application utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) technologies to enhance user experience. Our AI systems operate without collecting or processing personal data.
Privacy.ai-paragraph-2: All AI functionality is designed with privacy by design principles, ensuring that no personally identifiable information is required for the AI features to function effectively.
Privacy.ai-paragraph-3: Our AI systems are used primarily for:
Privacy.ai-use-recommendations: Generating personalized recommendations based on anonymized usage patterns
Privacy.ai-use-content: Creating and optimizing content within the application
Privacy.ai-use-support: Providing automated support responses based on common queries
Privacy.no-personal-data-paragraph-1: Our AI systems are specifically designed to function without collecting, storing, or processing personal data. They operate on anonymized and aggregated data patterns that cannot be traced back to individual users.
Privacy.no-personal-data-paragraph-2: When interacting with AI features in our application, your inputs are processed in real-time and are not stored or used to build user profiles.
Privacy.cookies-paragraph-1: We use essential cookies to ensure the proper functioning of our application. These cookies do not track your browsing activity on other websites or collect personal information.
Privacy.cookies-paragraph-2: You can configure your browser to refuse cookies, although this may limit your ability to use certain features of our application.
Privacy.security-paragraph: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect the information we collect and process. However, no method of transmission over the Internet or electronic storage is 100% secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.
Privacy.third-party-paragraph: Our application may integrate with third-party services for specific functionalities. These services have their own privacy policies, and we encourage you to review them. We do not share your information with third parties for marketing purposes.
Privacy.rights-paragraph: You have certain rights regarding your information. These include:
Privacy.rights-access: The right to access any information we have about you
Privacy.rights-delete: The right to request deletion of your email address from our newsletter subscription list
Privacy.rights-object: The right to object to processing of your information
Privacy.changes-paragraph: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. We will notify users of any material changes via email or through the application.
Privacy.contact-paragraph: If you have questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact our support team. We are committed to addressing your inquiries promptly and thoroughly.
